description:
Ever wonder how to use social media for professional use? In this beginner course we will work together to identify practical ways to use social media for business.

You can find ways to enhance your business, brand or funding campaign by understanding the fundamentals of social media for professional use. This course utilizes clear strategies of how social media can be used for internationalization, brand awareness, and personal marketing. I use real scenarios of organizations and companies who found success with the use of social media.

I want you to be successful and you will have an opportunity to complete hands-on activities in the course to quickly apply your newly grasped techniques. The United States Department of Labor has mentioned a projected growth within the Communication sector beyond 10% by 2022. You have an awesome opportunity to learn about social media and the influence it has on the various sectors in the communication industry.
title: Social Media & Digital Technology
